Here’s where the programming enthusiasts get to showcase their skills. They have to do it in teams of 3 where only 1 person codes at a time. Join the coding revolution.

Think your app is a game-changer? This is where you can send in any kind of app - web, mobile, tablet, desktop - and make the best out of this opportunity.

An event for Web Developers. A theme will be given to all participants two days prior to the event and they will have to build the website according to the theme and presentations will be conducted during the event.

Robotics has come a long way and i.Bot provides you with a wonderful opportunity to build an autonomous bot to fulfil a problem statement and dive into the world of robotics.

From Facebook to Zomato to your mobile phones, databases are everywhere! This is where modelling real-life scenarios and re-envisioning database designs come into play and players design their way through the given scenarios.

Students will engage themselves in a real-life auction where they will bid on a plethora of equipment. The task would be to build something from the same.

i.Biz provides a platform to young minds with business acumen to come up with plans to make it big. And you could also pitch in your start-up ideas and get investors!

Confident enough about your coding skills to be able to write them down blindfolded? (Well, not literally. But you’ll be screen blind!) Show us how you’ll do it.

The hunger for quizzes is truly satisfied by i.Quiz, a tech-based quiz featuring mind-boggling questions for all the quizzing enthusiasts.

For math geeks who love walking through numbers, this is an event where mathematical skills stand out. Come show us your mathematical instinct.

Love abstracting, coding and decoding? This is the event where participants will get to decrypt and encrypt messages and codes.

Robots are transforming our lifestyles so gear yourself up for action-packed live robot fights. Engage with an enemy and plunge into the fights.

The coolest cyber strife is here. In order to “Capture the (winning) flag”, attack opponents system and defend your system simultaneously. There are a plethora of bugs to deal with. GOOD LUCK!!!

Ever wondered how it feels to be on the first hand flying a drone. Come and test your skills as a drone racer. Bring your drone and race it. Earn points for design, complexity and special features.

A secret treasure expedition will be conducted within the territory of DAIICT. Dare to unveil the forbidden treasures that lie within the shadows. A complete fun-filled event where the students hunt for various "treasures” around the campus.

Do you get an adrenaline rush while playing games? Then this event is what you've been waiting for! We bring to you the gaming experience of counter-strike, Dota and NFS.

This is for cubing enthusiasts, those into solving the world’s favourite challenge, the Rubik’s cube. Show us how your fingers move mechanically when you get a cube.

Love solving crossword puzzles? Challenge your mind to the mysterious world of puzzles through i.Maze.

Are you an amateur photographer or a photography enthusiast? Do you understand the craft of taking pictures, documenting a story, conceptualizing an idea and capturing emotions? If so, then this is the competition for you.

One man's trash is another man's treasure. Make simple yet stunning things from turning trash into seriously entertaining, well-designed toys, by just using basic principles of science.

We all know how to ride a bicycle fast, but the real challenge lies in riding it slowly.
